newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER SHOWCASE-LIVERPOOL V MANCHESTER UNITED TEAMS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER SHOWCASE-LIVERPOOL V MANCHESTER UNITED TEAMS.

text.p: Teams for Saturday's English premier league match between Liverpool and Manchester United at Anfield (kickoff 1015 gmt):

Liverpool: 1-David James; 3-Bjorn Tore Kvarme, 5-Mark Wright, 4-Jason McAteer, 7-Steve McManaman, 20-Stig Inge Bjornebye, 12-Steve Harkness, 16-Michael Thomas, 10-John Barnes, 11-Jamie Redknapp, 9-Robbie Fowler.

Manchester United: 1-Peter Schmeichel; 2-Gary Neville, 12-Philip Neville, 19-Ronnie Johnsen, 6-Gary Pallister, 16-Roy Keane, 7-Eric Cantona, 8-Nicky Butt, 10-David Beckham, 9-Andy Cole, 18-Paul Scholes.
